achievements: Twice winner of the Man Booker Prize for 'Wolf Hall' (2009) and 'Bring Up the Bodies' (2012)
Known for historical fiction set in Tudor England
Academy Award winner for Best Actress for 'Boys Don't Cry' (1999) and 'Million Dollar Baby' (2004)
Known for her roles in Disney Channel series 'Lizzie McGuire' and films like 'A Cinderella Story'
Successful music career with hit singles such as 'Come Clean' and 'So Yesterday'
